resources.string: Please enter the Length of the Rectangle
Please enter the Width of the Rectangle
Please enter the Radius of a Circle.
Please enter the Length/Width of a square
Please enter the length of Triangle.
The value of radius should be greater than 0 and cannot exceed, %1$s px for a circle.
The value of Length and Width should be greater than 0 and lesser than %1$s px and the value of width should not be greater than %2$s px for a rectangle.
The value of Length/Width should be greater than 0 and lesser than %1$s px for a square.
The value of the Triangle side should not be greater than %1$s px for a square.
